CustomField.description: This field is created as part of CCRM-2905 in release 3. This field will auto-populate with Account ID related to Quote after Quote creation, so that it will only display the contacts associated to related account of Quote on "Contact Name" field of Quote.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field should not be removed from the page layout otherwise the lookup filter logic built for Quote "Contact Name" field will not work.
CustomField.label: Contact Filter
